titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct a bridge on Federal land west of and adjacent to Folsom Dam in California, and for other purposes.
To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct a bridge on Federal land west of and adjacent to Folsom Dam in California, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 22 - 20.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 108-202.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 109.

bill.summary: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to carry out a project to construct a bridge on Federal land west of and adjacent to Folsom Dam in California.Requires the Secretary to enter into an agreement to transfer the bridge to the City of Folsom which shall assume full responsibility for its operation and maintenance.
